title.narrative: Promoting Community-based Climate Resilience in the Fisheries Sector of Jamaica

description.narrative: The project aims to enhance climate resilience among targeted fishing and fish farming communities of Jamaica. The intended outcomes are (i) increased access among fishers and fishing farmers to climate-smart livelihoods opportunities; (ii) improved sustainable fisheries management including monitoring, control, and surveillance to build climate resilience of marine and coastal ecosystems.
